data.enText: to give most of your time, energy, attention, etc. to sb/sth

data.chText: 她全力倾注于自己的事业。
data.enText: She devoted herself to her career.
to give an amount of time, attention, etc. to sth

data.chText: 我一天只能在这个工作上花两个小时。
data.enText: I could only devote two hours a day to the work.

simple_means.memory_skill: de 加强 + vot 发誓 + e → 拼命发誓 → 献身

means: 将(文章或讲话的某一部分)专用(于)

ex.chText: 他毕生致力于为人民服务。
ex.enText: He dedicated his life to serving the people.

synonyms.bx: 较正式用词，通常指献身于崇高的事业或活动。

ex.enText: The priest consecrated himself to the Church.

synonyms.bx: 尤指为宗教而奉献、献身。

ex.enText: She devoted her attention to her work.

ex.chText: 他投身于发展航天工业。
ex.enText: He devoted himself to developing the space industry.

synonyms.bx: 指把生命、精力、时间等用于某一目标、事业等，常与介词 to 连用。

data.enText: to give most of your time, energy, attention, etc. to sb/sth

data.chText: 她全力倾注于自己的事业。
data.enText: She devoted herself to her career.
to give an amount of time, attention, etc. to sth

data.chText: 我一天只能在这个工作上花两个小时。
data.enText: I could only devote two hours a day to the work.

tr: give entirely to a specific person, activity, or cause
example: She committed herself to the work of God
give one's talents to a good cause
consecrate your life to the church

tr: set aside or apart for a specific purpose or use
example: this land was devoted to mining

value.def: If you devote yourself, your time, or your energy to something, you spend all or most of your time or energy on it.

example.ex: He decided to devote the rest of his life to scientific investigation...
example.tran: 他决定将自己的余生献给科学研究事业。

example.ex: Considerable resources have been devoted to proving him a liar...
example.tran: 为了证明他是个骗子已投入了相当多的人力和财力。

example.ex: She gladly gave up her part-time job to devote herself entirely to her art.
example.tran: 她欣然辞去了兼职工作，全身心地投入到她的艺术中去。

value.tran: 献（身）；奉献，投入(时间、精力等)

value.def: If you devote a particular proportion of a piece of writing or a speech to a particular subject, you deal with the subject in that amount of space or time.

example.ex: He devoted a major section of his massive report to an analysis of US aircraft design...
example.tran: 在他的长篇报告中，他用了很大的篇幅来分析美国飞机的设计。

example.ex: Page upon page is devoted to the chain of events leading to the Prime Minister's resignation.
example.tran: 一页又一页的篇幅都用来描述导致首相辞职的一连串事件。

value.tran: 将(文章或讲话的某一部分)专用（于）

trans: 把…专用于，完全用于（某事或做某事)；致力于…

partsOfSpeech.dec: de 加强 + vot 发誓 + e → 拼命发誓 → 献身
vot 发誓 + ary 表人 →〔一同〕发誓的人 → 热心支持者

partsOfSpeech.d: 投票（投票前需要发誓以示诚实）

partsOfSpeech.dec: vot 发誓 + er 表名词 → 投票者
